name: SPEED DIAL
description:
In SPEED DIAL you type out words as fast as you can before the time runs out - but there's a twist: you're typing it on your slow and cumbersome Nokia 3310 keypad!

CONTROLS:

To represent the Nokia 3310 keypad, you use... the keypad on your keyboard!

Imagine it like this:

To type a desired letter, you have to click on a specific button a number of times. On the Nokia, you had to press the 2-button three times to get the letter C, or press the 7-button once to get the letter P.

To make it more natural (and authentic) for those born before the 2000's, the letters are placed on the same physical places as on the Nokia. Example: The top right button (number 9 on the keyboard numpad) gives you D, E, and F . The bottom left gives you P, Q, R, and S. The middle button gives you J, K, and L.

The game can be played both on the keypad and normal numbers on the keyboard, but using the keypad is HIGHLY recommended.

Please leave a comment with your thoughts!

Hope you enjoy it!
